title: Barbecued vegetables with couscous
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 red pepper', '1 courgette', '1 small aubergine', '1 large red onion', '85g (3 oz) frozen broad beans', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '175g (6 oz) couscous', '225ml (8 fl oz) vegetable stock']
